algorithm_technique: Brute-force iteration through all possible triplets with conditional checks.
problem_summary_simple: Count triplets in an array that satisfy specific absolute difference conditions between elements.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through all combinations of three indices (i < j < k) and check if the absolute differences meet the given thresholds.
key_insights: The constraints on n (up to 100) allow for an O(n^3) solution.
Carefully check all three absolute difference conditions for each triplet.
The order of indices (i < j < k) is important.
